title: Red Dead Redemption's New Version Launched With A Big Issue On Xbox
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.                                          Rockstar Games launched the new...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                Rockstar Games launched the new version of Red Dead Redemption on modern consoles and mobile today, December 2, but the rollout did not go entirely smoothly on Xbox.People who already own Red Dead Redemption for Xbox 360 digitally were expecting the new edition for Xbox Series X|S to automatically show up as a free download, but quickly noticed this didn't happen.This is an issue that Rockstar is aware of and the studio is working with Microsoft to resolve it. "Thank you for your patience," Rockstar said.          The new version of Red Dead Redemption supports higher frame rates, HDR support, and resolutions up to 4K for PS5 and Xbox Series X|S. The Switch 2 edition, meanwhile, supports DLSS, HDR, and mouse controls.Developers Double Eleven and Cast Iron Games created the new versions of Red Dead Redemption for console in collaboration with Rockstar Games. Red Dead Redemption is also available now for iOS and Android for the first time as part of a collaboration with Netflix. All subscribers get it for free.December 2 also marked the day that Red Dead Redemption arrived on PlayStation Plus. GTA+ subscribers can also get the new version of the game as part of their membership.In addition to this new version of Red Dead Redemption, Rockstar is rumored to be working on new versions of Red Dead Redemption 2 for modern consoles. For more, check out all the best Red Dead Redemption 2 mods in the gallery below.
                                  
  
    Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

title: CoD Season 1 Battle Pass Adds New Guns, Operators, And Faster Unlocks In BO7 And Warzone
description: By     S.E. Doster   on December 2, 2025 at 1:13PM PST                                GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases...
body:
By 
    S.E. Doster
   on December 2, 2025 at 1:13PM PST    
          
                  GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
                Call of Duty Season 1 arrives in Black Ops 7 and Warzone on December 4, and Activision has revealed a detailed look at the contents of the brand-new battle pass. Season 1's battle pass includes over a hundred items to earn across free and premium tiers. This content includes two more guns, a new operator, and plenty of cosmetic items to earn. Season 1 also changes how players unlock items in the battle pass to make it more rewarding.Purchasing the standard ($10) battle pass for Season 1 includes an instant operator unlock for Dorne, who is the season's newest operator for the Guild faction. Call of Duty's $30 BlackCell pass returns with plenty of bonus content and battle-pass tier skips. Season 1's new BlackCell operator is called Scorn, who is clad in full-body armor.The two weapons in the Season 1 battle pass are the Kogot-7 submachine gun, and the fan-favorite Maddox assault rifle from Black Ops 4 returns as the Maddox RFB. Just like previous seasons, these new DLC weapons are unlocked in the free tiers of the pass.The developer says the studio has "taken learnings" from Black Ops 6's battle pass completion times and made tuning adjustments for a more satisfying journey for players. Earlier pages in the Black Ops 7 battle pass can now be completed faster with fewer tiers needed to unlock the more desirable HVT content, while later pages will contain more rewards. This means players will earn more high-value content sooner across all 100 tiers.Additionally, players can now earn battle pass tokens by completing daily challenges. These challenges will be available across multiplayer, Zombies, Warzone, Co-op campaign, and Endgame.All of these new battle pass rewards can be seen in the gallery below. The images also include Season 1's new shop bundles, including a new operator bundle for David Mason and skins for the Call of Duty League.Dorne instant operator unlockAlden Dorne is part of  The Guild and Emma Kagan's right-hand man. He's instantly unlocked by purchasing the premium battle pass. An additional skin is unlocked for those who purchase the BlackCell bundle.The battle pass instant rewards page includes the following items: 10% Battle Pass XP BoostThe new Dorne Operator including his "Adjutant" operator skin and BlackCell variant for BlackCell ownersThe "Chain of Command" Legendary blueprint for the X9 Maverick assault rifleThe "Linked" reticleThe "Rank and File" large decalBlackCell bundleThe $30 BlackCell bundle for the Season 1 battle pass includes several additional perks and premium items. 20 Battle Pass Tier Skips1,100 COD PointsThe new "Scorn" BlackCell operatorThe "Ultimatum" Mastercraft Blueprint for the Carbon 57 SMG with Tracers and Death FXThe "Heavy Fire" Companion Finishing MoveThe "BlackCell No. 1" HUD ThemeThe "Clock Out" Gun ScreenThe "BlackCell" Clan Tag (showcased in Lobbies and Winner's Circles)BlackCell owners can also earn even more rewards throughout the Season 1 battle pass, unlocking the following bonus content:Seven BlackCell-exclusive Operator Skins: Two Operator skins for Dorne, and one each for Dempsey, Zaveri, Anderson, Richtofen, and SamuelsSeven BlackCell-exclusive Weapon Blueprints: MXR-17 Assault Rifle, Echo 12 Shotgun, Razor 9mm SMG, XM325 LMG, Kogot-7 SMG, M8A1 Marksman Rifle, and the Maddox RFB Assault RifleOver 130 item rewards (Battle Pass and BlackCell related) for those who fully complete the Season 1 BlackCell Battle PassDempsey's "Mauler" operator skin and BlackCell variantUnlocked as HVT reward on Page 2Zaveri's "Ravage" operator skin and BlackCell variantUnlocked as HVT reward on Page 450/50's "Collateral" operator skinUnlocked on Page 6 of the battle passAnderson's "Reboot” operator skin and BlackCell variantUnlocked as an HVT reward on Page 7Razor's "Knife Edge" operator skinThis skin is unlocked on Page 8 of the battle passRichtofen's "Chemtrail" operator skin and BlackCell variantThese are unlocked as an HVT reward on Page 9Grimm's "Array" operator skinThis skin is unlocked on Page 11 of the battle pass.Samuels's "Wayward" operator skin and BlackCell variantThese skins are unlocked as HVT rewards on Page 12.Wei Lin's "Rainfall" operator skinThis skin is unlocked on Page 14 of the battle pass.Kogot-7The Kogot-7 submachine gun looks like a renamed MP7 from past Call of Duty games. It's unlocked for free on Page 3 of the battle pass.Weapon details:Levels: 39Mags: 4Mag Size: 30Mastery badges: YesAttachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire ModsPrestige Attachment: Stock - MFS Kogot-7 AkimboMaddox RFBThe fan-favorite Maddox assault rifle from Black Ops 4 returns as the Maddox RFB. This gun is unlocked for free on Page 6 of the battle pass.Weapon details:Levels: 43Mags: 3Mag size: 40Mastery badges: YesAttachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire ModsPrestige Attachment: Barrel - 13" MFS Echo-Fire BarrelEarly battle pass blueprint rewards"Chain of Command" X9 Maverick assault rifle - Instant reward"Zero Hour" MPC-25 SMG - Page 1More blueprint rewards"Firing Line" MXR-17 assault rifle - HVT reward Page 1"Hot Range" MK.78 LMG - Page 2Even more blueprints"Intensity" Warden 308 marksman rifle - Page 3"Red Mist" M15 Mod 0 assault rifle - Page 4New launcher and sniper blueprints"Swatter" Arrow 109 launcher - Page 6"Reroute" Shadow SK sniper rifle - Page 7Pistol and SMG blueprints"Fugue State" Coda 9 Pistol - Page 9"Nanostorm" Ryden 45k SMG - Page 9Shotgun and LMG blueprints"Evac" Akita Shotgun - Page 10"Drumbeat" XM325 LMG - HVT reward on Page 10Pistol and knife blueprints"Unspoken Truth" Velox 5.7 Pistol - Page 12"Terminal Spike" Knife - Page 13Colorful weapon blueprints"Neuroslicer" Maddox RFB assault rifle - HVT reward on Page 14"Dissonance" AK-27 assault rifle - Page completion rewardBlackCell blueprintsThere are also weapon blueprints exclusively for BlackCell owners, including this "Ultimatum" Mastercraft blueprint with death effects and tracers for the Carbon 57 submachine gun. New equipment skins and optics“Linked” Reticle (Optic Reticle), Battle Pass Instant Reward"Candle" optic reticle - Page 2"Clash" Cluster Grenade skin - Page 3"Digital Breakdown" EMP Grenade skin - Page 9"Converge" optic reticle - Page 10New finishing moves and emotes"Fast Work" Finishing move - Page 1"Wanna See a Magic Trick?" Finishing move - Page 4"Don’t Even Start" Emote - Page 7"Two Thumbs Up" Emote - Page 9"Electro-Pop" Finishing move - Page 12"Get Good" Emote - Page 14"Busted Beaker" Finishing move - Page 14New sprays"Synth Enhancement" Spray - Page 3"Entity" Spray - Page 8"Cranium Crack" Spray - Page 10"Fog Phantom" Spray - Page 12"Bummed Pixel" Spray - Page 13Additional battle pass contentThe Season 1 battle pass offers dozens of additional items of content, including items from the following categories:CoD PointsWeapon CharmsWeapon Large DecalsWeapon StickersGobbleGumsEmblems (some animated)Calling Cards (some animated)Loading ScreensGun Screen (BlackCell only)HUD Theme (BlackCell only)Clan Tag (BlackCell only)Consumable 2XP & 2WXP TokensCompletion Page rewardsReach the Completion Page of the Season 01 Battle Pass to gain access to the final rewards, unlocked by completing all other Pages first. Unlock the Completion Page to instantly acquire the following:200 CoD Points"Disharmony" Ultra Skin and "Disharmony" BlackCell variant operator skin for Dorne"Dissonance" AK-27 assault rifle weapon blueprint"No Slowing Down" animated Calling Card"Energized One" animated Emblem"Gift Card" GobbleGumDorne's "Disharmony" operator skin and BlackCell variantTracer Pack: Aerial Dominance Ultra Skin bundleThis Bundle includes the following items:"Flight Commander" Anderson Ultra operator skin (JSOC)"Pitch" AK-27 assault rifle blueprint (Tracers)"Yaw" XR-3 Ion sniper rifle blueprint (Tracers)"Drone Dropped" Finishing move"Remote Ready" Emote"Controlled" Weapon charm"Air Superiority" animated Calling Card"Laser Targeted" animated Emblem"Signal Power" SprayTracer Pack: Legend Reborn BundleThis new operator bundle for David Mason will arrive later in the season with the following items:"Old Wounds" Mason operator skin (JSOC)"Time and Fate" Hawker HX sniper rifle blueprint (Tracers, Death FX)"Cordis Die" MXR-17 assault rifle (Tracers, Death FX)And more, including an animated Calling Card, animated Emblem, Loading Screen, and Large DecalCall of Duty League: CDL Launch Pack 2026The 2026 CDL Launch Pack includes12 items and four separate operators (with a skin for each):2026 CDL Home Competitor (JSOC, Male)2026 CDL Home Competitor (JSOC, Female)2026 CDL Away Competitor (The Guild, Male)2026 CDL Away Competitor (The Guild, Female)"Ego Fade" Universal Camo"The Hard Carry" Calling Card"I’m Beaming" Animated Calling Card"Locked On" Weapon Charm"Built Different" Large Decal"LANimal" Emblem"No Shot" Spray"Cold Crown" Animated Emblem

title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Mega Dimension DLC Adds Another Mega Evolution For Lucario
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.                                          A handful of new Mega-Evolved...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                A handful of new Mega-Evolved Pokemon are making their debut in Pokemon Legends: Z-A's upcoming Mega Dimension DLC, and ahead of the expansion's launch, The Pokemon Company has revealed another new one: a second Mega Evolution for Lucario.Mega Lucario Z marks the game's first Z Mega Evolution--a new kind of Mega-Evolved form that has a shorter cooldown period, but depletes Mega Energy much more quickly. According to the official Pokemon website, "Pokemon that undergo Z Mega Evolution require less time to fire off moves after receiving the orders from their Trainer, but they also burn through their Mega Power very quickly, making them less suited for long battles."          Like the original Mega Lucario, Mega Lucario Z is a steel and fighting type. Where this form differs, however, is in its defense and speed stats. As the official Pokemon website explains, "While Mega Lucario concentrates its aura into a destructive force, Mega Lucario Z uses it to surround its entire body, cloaking itself to increase its defense, flexibility, and agility."It's unclear how many other Pokemon will be able to undergo Z Mega Evolution, but we've already gotten a look at several new Mega-Evolved forms coming in the Mega Dimension DLC. In addition to Mega Raichu X and Mega Raichu Y, the DLC will introduce Mega Evolutions for Baxcalibur, Chimecho, and the mythical Pokemon Zeraora.Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Mega Dimension DLC launches on December 10 and costs $30. The expansion takes players to an alternate dimension known as Hyperspace Lumiose, where they'll encounter Pokemon not normally available in the base game, including wild Pokemon that are over level 100.In the meantime, Pokemon Legends: Z-A's third Ranked Battle season is underway until December 17. Players who hit Rank S before the season ends will receive a Mega Stone for Chestnaught. A new Mystery Gift is also now available. All players can claim a free Mewtwonite X and Mewtwonite Y, which will unlock a new side quest that leads to an encounter with the legendary Pokemon Mewtwo.
                                  
  
    Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
